# This file was generated by Jucer2Reprojucer from "ronn.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("ronn")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)

find_package(Torch REQUIRED)

set(ronn_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/ronn.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "/Users/cjstein/JUCE/modules")


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.4.7"
  PROJECT_FILE "${ronn_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "SKO4sA"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "ronn"
  PROJECT_VERSION "0.0.1"
  COMPANY_NAME "Christian Steinmetz"
  COMPANY_WEBSITE "christiansteinmetz.com"
  REPORT_JUCE_APP_USAGE ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  PROJECT_TYPE "Audio Plug-in"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.ChristianSteinmetz.ronn"
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "C++14"
)

jucer_audio_plugin_settings(
  PLUGIN_FORMATS
    "VST3"
    "AU"
    "Standalone"
  # PLUGIN_CHARACTERISTICS
  PLUGIN_NAME "ronn"
  PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION "Randomised Overdrive Neural Network"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER "Christian Steinmetz"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER_CODE "Manu"
  PLUGIN_CODE "Sko4"
  # PLUGIN_CHANNEL_CONFIGURATIONS
  PLUGIN_AAX_IDENTIFIER "com.ChristianSteinmetz.ronn"

    "Fx"
  PLUGIN_RTAS_CATEGORY
    "ePlugInCategory_None"
  PLUGIN_AAX_CATEGORY
    "AAX_ePlugInCategory_None"

)

  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
)

  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "ronn"
)

  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Release"

)
